TQL: SELECT name,customId, parentRegion.name,parentRegion.customId, timeZone FROM regions
SELECT name,customId, region.name, isGlobal FROM bill_items
SELECT name, portal,  region.name,isGlobal  FROM roles

SELECT tour.name,employee.name,performedBy.name,status, date(startedOn) as 'start_date', endedOn,durationMinutes, left_str(right_str(startDateTime,14),8) as 'start_time',endDateTime FROM checkpoint_tour_sessions WHERE date(startedOn) = '2021-04-13'
SELECT region,parentClient.customId,parentClient.name, company,customId,updatedOn FROM clients order by parentClient,customId
SELECT name,instructions,account.name, position.name,active, scanActionType, scanActionMessage, scanReportTemplate, scanCode FROM checkpoints
SELECT label,name,type,required,adminOnly,displayOrder,listItems,  reportTemplate.name FROM report_template_fields order by reportTemplate,name,displayOrder
SELECT region.name, customId,name,username,email, jobTitle, employmentProfile.employeeClass.name FROM employees
SELECT employee.name, employee.region.name, employeeClass.name id  FROM employment_profiles
SELECT employee.customId,employee.name, account.customId,account.name, active,startedOn,endedOn FROM employee_account_assignments
